price: 12. Sinaamey Yalla kinni isi duddaa kee isi inkittinaane tascasse astootik cankaxa sin taybulleem, kakkaqo siinil obtaamak meesitak, hinnay rob siinih edde radaamah kaah sangeelak, Yalli isi duddah maggo lee quuka qubultay tuxxiq siinik edde yani siinih gina.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرِيكُمُ ٱلۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَيُنشِئُ ٱلسَّحَابَ ٱلثِّقَالَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunshi-u al-saḥāba al-thiqāla
